title: New: TĀLĀ – Serbia
content: TĀLĀ‘s debut track, The Duchess, marked her out as one of 2014’s most important new names, and todays follow up, Serbia, is yet another big step up. Soulful and uncompromising in it’s levels of energy; to be honest, it’s one of the finest tracks of the year thus far. Ready for London’s slickest dancefloors, as well as big-time radio play, TĀLĀ is destined to go very, very far. Pre-order the three track EP here, and check out Serbia below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
